itinerary.title: Arrival in Abu Dhabi & Sea World Adventure
highlights: Free shuttle service on Yas Island
itinerary.description: Upon arrival at Abu Dhabi International Airport, you will be greeted and transferred to your hotel at Yas Island. After check-in, spend the day at Sea World Abu Dhabi, a one-of-a-kind marine theme park with underwater worlds, thrilling rides, and animal encounters. Enjoy free shuttle service around Yas Island. Overnight stay in Abu Dhabi.

itinerary.title: Warner Bros World – Heroes & Cartoons
itinerary.description: After breakfast, enjoy a full day at Warner Bros World Abu Dhabi, an indoor theme park bringing your favorite cartoon characters and superheroes to life. Explore themed zones from Flintstones to Gotham City with exciting rides, shows, and interactive attractions. Use free shuttle service across Yas Island. Overnight stay in Abu Dhabi.

itinerary.title: Ferrari World – Speed & Thrills
highlights: Formula Rossa – World's fastest roller coaster
itinerary.description: Today is all about high-speed thrills. After breakfast, spend the full day at Ferrari World, home to the world's fastest roller coaster, Formula Rossa. Enjoy family rides, simulators, and Ferrari car displays. Return to your hotel for overnight stay in Abu Dhabi.

itinerary.title: Transfer to Dubai – Frame & Burj Khalifa
itinerary.description: After check-out from Abu Dhabi hotel, travel to Dubai. First stop is the Dubai Frame, offering panoramic views of old and new Dubai from its glass bridge. Later, explore Dubai Mall with endless shopping, dining and entertainment. Evening visit to Burj Khalifa – ascend to the 124th floor observation deck of the world's tallest building. Overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.title: Dolphinarium & Desert Safari
itinerary.description: After breakfast, visit Dubai Dolphinarium to watch playful dolphins and seals in interactive performances. In the afternoon, experience the famous Desert Safari with dune bashing, camel rides, henna painting, and cultural performances. Enjoy BBQ dinner under the desert sky. Return to Dubai hotel for overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Departure from Dubai
itinerary.description: Your wonderful Dubai family tour comes to an end today. After breakfast, check out from your hotel and transfer to Dubai International Airport for your flight back home.

destinations.description: Himachal Pradesh, nestled in the western Himalayas, is a picturesque northern Indian state known for its breathtaking landscapes, snow-clad peaks, and serene valleys. Often referred to as the 'Land of Gods' (Dev Bhoomi), it is dotted with ancient temples, peaceful monasteries, and charming hill towns.

packages.title: Kasol to Kheerganga: Nature, Trek & Tranquility
highlights: 12 km scenic Kheerganga trek through dense forests
Natural hot water springs with healing properties
Overnight camping under starry Himalayan skies
Famous Israeli cafes in Kasol – Jim Morrison, Moon Dance
Visit Manikaran Sahib Gurudwara & hot springs
Bonfire and music session at campsite
Sunrise & sunset views from 3,050 meters altitude
inclusions: Accommodation: 1 night in Kasol + 1 night in Kheerganga campsite
3 Breakfasts & 2 Dinners
Transportation from Delhi (AC Volvo bus)
All toll taxes and parking
All sightseeing as per itinerary

exclusions: Any adventure activities (river rafting, paragliding, etc.)

Anything not specifically mentioned under Inclusions

itinerary.title: Departure from Delhi – Overnight Journey
highlights: Board AC Volvo bus from Delhi
itinerary.description: Your amazing Himachal trip begins in the evening as you board the AC Volvo bus from Delhi to Kasol. Settle into your comfortable seat and enjoy the 9-10 hour journey through the night. Watch the stars, feel the chill breeze, listen to music, or simply relax as you head towards the mountains.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kasol – Cafes & Local Exploration
highlights: Jim Morrison Café & Moon Dance Café
itinerary.description: Early morning arrival in the beautiful town of Kasol, located in the Parvati Valley. Our driver will take you to your accommodation. Relax for a while, then begin your exploration of this charming hill town. Visit iconic cafes like Jim Morrison Café or Moon Dance Café. Don't miss trying authentic Israeli food, for which Kasol is famous. You can also shop for interesting Pahadi items, woolens, and handicrafts. In the evening, enjoy the chill vibes with soft music. Return to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Kheerganga Trek – Waterfalls & Hot Springs
highlights: Wake up early for trek preparation
itinerary.description: Wake up early and enjoy a healthy breakfast to fuel up for the adventurous Kheerganga trek. Board a local taxi to reach Barshaini, the starting point of the trek. Begin your 12 km trek which takes approximately 4-5 hours. Along the way, enjoy stunning waterfalls, natural hot springs, breathtaking mountain views, and dense pine and oak forest paths. Upon reaching Kheerganga at 3,050 meters altitude, reward yourself with stunning photographs. Sit quietly, witness the mesmerizing sunset, and later gather around the bonfire. A delicious hot dinner will be served. Sleep peacefully in your campsite under the starry Himalayan sky.

itinerary.title: Trek Down – Manikaran Sahib & Departure
highlights: Holy hot springs with healing properties
itinerary.description: Wake up early to witness the spectacular sunrise over the Himalayas at Kheerganga. Enjoy a delicious breakfast, then begin your trek down to Barshaini (another 4-5 hours). Upon reaching, visit the sacred Manikaran Sahib Gurudwara, a revered religious site for both Hindus and Sikhs. Don't miss the holy hot springs, believed to have healing and medicinal properties. Continue your journey back to Kasol, where you can do some last-minute shopping for souvenirs and local handicrafts. In the evening, board your Volvo bus to Delhi, carrying wonderful memories of your Himachal adventure.
